tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communication_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    sender VARCHAR(255),
    receiver VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(255),
    receiver VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ManipulationOpportunities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    target VARCHAR(255),
    method VARCHAR(255),
    information TEXT,
    identified_by VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(255),
    receiver VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE manipulation_attempts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attacker VARCHAR(255),
    target VARCHAR(255),
    tactic VARCHAR(255),
    success BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_record_id INT,
    manipulation_attempt_id INT,
    analysis_report TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_record_id INT,
    vulnerability_type VARCHAR(255),
    severity INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationRecords (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ManipulationOpportunities (
    opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_id INT,
    manipulation_type VARCHAR(50),
    manipulation_description TEXT,
    manipulation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Attackers (
    attacker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attacker_name VARCHAR(50),
    attacker_location VARCHAR(50),
    attack_method VARCHAR(50),
    attack_date TIMESTAMP
);
